Topic.Title: The lack of Anyone caring about AMZN is amazing

Message.Msg: Geeg - I explained my position too you already. I have three trades with Amazon. (1) a core short I will hold until 180 at least, (2) a trade short that I come in and out of on runs to make weekly money, (3) I sell puts to generate income off of core short, and trade those on upswings (typcially sell puts on Thurs aft, and Monday aft, buy to cover them on Fri aft depending on the price action). So yes, I am short in the core still, coverred by trade shorts already (will add more in the low 280's if it gets there), and am looking to sell more puts if she touches the 50 day SMA at $265.

Topic.Title: Lack of insider buys

Message.Msg: Actually everyone is buying. Technically. Obama and Benanke are using taxpayers' money to buy stocks and bonds. And the more they print and buy, the more valuable the Fed's holdings are. Everybody is a winner. Every American is a winner. The tricky part is how Bernake is going to unwind the massive bond and stock holdings without triggering a selloff because individuals still holding stocks and bonds are afraid that the biggest holder will begin to sell. Everyone wants to sell their parts before the Fed does.
